cause.title: Cause
cause.description: A string identifier that will be sent along with the job trigger request.

#api_key.title: API key
#api_key.description: API key string. Instruction on how to obtain one can be found here.

dbt_cloud_url.title: dbt Cloud URL
dbt_cloud_url.description: Optional â€“ defaults to https://cloud.getdbt.com. More information about dbt URLs can be found here.

max_wait_time.title: Max wait time
max_wait_time.description: Maximum time to wait. Used only when Wait for result is set to true.

wait_for_result.title: Wait for result
wait_for_result.description: Select this option if you want the component to wait until the job finishes before storing artifacts.

ignore_artifacts.title: Don't store artifacts
ignore_artifacts.description: Select this option if you want the component to ignore artifacts.
